work_exp:
[u"Product Manager
September 2015 to Present
As the world's #1 job site, with over 180 million unique visitors every month from over 50 different countries,
Indeed has become the catalyst for putting the world to work. Indeed is intensely passionate about delivering the right fit for every hire. Indeed helps companies of all sizes hire the best talent and offers the best opportunity
for job seekers to get hired.

I help people get jobs.", u'Product Manager
Indeed - Austin, TX
April 2014 to August 2015
Casting Networks is the dominant provider of software solutions to the commercial casting industry. Nearly
every commercial you see on TV was cast using our tools. Top talent agents, power CDs, and talented people
around the world communicate through our submission, scheduling, and media presentation software in a B2B2C ecosystem. With nearly 1M talent in our database and innovative workflows, we are positioned to
expand deeper and rapidly into theatrical, modeling, and background casting across the globe as well as launch new verticals.

Achievements:
▶ Led initiative to internationalize, localize and translate software allowing entry into new markets. Catapulting
the company from 4 cities to dozens of markets worldwide in 14 countries in 5 years.
▶ Helped design/build FastCapture and devised gotomarket strategy on multiple platforms (Android, iOS, PC,
and Mac) in a client facing role. 7M auditions have been uploaded through the app to date. 100+GB of audition
videos added daily.
▶ Balanced 15 year roadmaps between multiple web properties & verticals serving the high fashion industry,
commercials, theatrical, a model social network, and extras casting.
▶ Personally responsible, from concept to launch, for new customer acquisition portals that increased signup
rates by 120%. #1, by placing iPad kiosks apps in physical audition locations to increase brand awareness and cobrand with major casting facilities. #2, by overhauling a 12 page setup & purchase flow into a 60 sec
modern signup form.
▶ Managed expectations while undergoing enterprise level system architecture, whilst coping with extreme
technical debt, helping transition from limited ClassicASP web pages to complex SOA systems communicating through Message Queues (RabbitMQ) and APIs in real time (Socket.io).
▶ Institutionalized business intelligence platform (Sisense) to harness 12+ years of data across 36 disparate
SQL databases, personally writing SQL scripts to groom arcane columns and tables into sensible, accessible
data. We now have 50+ enlightening, insightful, and visual dashboards that are updated nightly and critical to business decisions.', u'Director of Product
